advancement.gatorade.a_whole_new_world.d: A whole new world of hydration awaits!
advancement.gatorade.drink_first_gatorad: More hydrating than water! Drank Gatorade for the first time.
advancement.gatorade.drink_new_flavor.ti: Variety is the Spice of Life
advancement.gatorade.drink_new_flavor.de: You tried a different flavor of Gatorade and expanded your horizons!
advancement.gatorade.drink_10_gatorade_b: Drank 10 Gatorade bottles. You're starting to appreciate the finer flavors of hydration!
advancement.gatorade.drink_25_gatorade_b: Drank 25 Gatorade bottles. You're on your way to becoming a hydration expert!
advancement.gatorade.drink_50_gatorade_b: Drank 50 Gatorade bottles. Are you doing this because you want to or because you have to?
advancement.gatorade.drink_75_gatorade_b: Drank 75 Gatorade bottles. Surely, you must be drinking it out of appreciation for the drink.
advancement.gatorade.drink_100_gatorade_: Drank 100 Gatorade bottles. You have come to realize you are drinking Gatorade out of fear losing hydration.
advancement.gatorade.drink_500_gatorade_: Drank 500 Gatorade bottles. Even though it may not be your favorite, you can't stop drinking it.
advancement.gatorade.drink_1000_gatorade: Drank 1,000 Gatorade bottles. You no longer care about the flavors, you just need the electrolytes.
advancement.gatorade.drink_10000_gatorad: Drank 10,000 Gatorade bottles. I can't believe it.
Drank every type of Gatorade. Truly a connoisseur!
advancement.gatorade.obtain_cooler.title: Big Shot
advancement.gatorade.obtain_cooler.desc: Obtained a Gatorade Cooler. Now you're a real team player!
advancement.gatorade.obtain_squeeze_bott: Obtained a Squeeze Bottle. Now you're ready to hydrate on the go!
block.gatorade.gatorade_cooler_block.not: The Gatorade Cooler does not contain enough fluid to fill a bucket (%d mB/%d mB).
block.gatorade.gatorade_cooler_block.con: The Gatorade Cooler contains an invalid fluid: %s (Was Chaos Mode enabled?)
block.gatorade.gatorade_cooler_block.dif: The Gatorade Cooler contains a different fluid!
item.gatorade.gatorade_bucket.name: %s Bucket
item.gatorade.squeeze_bottle.cooler.full: The Gatorade Cooler is already full!
item.gatorade.squeeze_bottle.bottle.fill: Filled Squeeze Bottle with %d mB of %s!
item.gatorade.squeeze_bottle.bottle.empt: Emptied %d mB of %s into the Gatorade Cooler!
item.gatorade.squeeze_bottle.bottle.diff: The Squeeze Bottle contains a different fluid!
gatorade.configuration.title: Gatorade Configs
gatorade.configuration.chaosMode.tooltip:
Allow filling of Gatorade containers with any liquid, not just Gatorade fluids.

Yes, you can drink crude oil.
gatorade.configuration.electrolytes.tool: Enable and configure the electrolytes system that tracks player hydration and applies effects.
gatorade.configuration.enableElectrolyte: Enable the electrolytes system that tracks player hydration and applies effects.
gatorade.configuration.electrolytesDecay: Rate at which electrolytes decay over time, in ticks (20 ticks = 1 second).
gatorade.configuration.electrolytesSprin: Rate at which electrolytes decay while sprinting, in ticks (20 ticks = 1 second).
gatorade.configuration.electrolytesMoveD: Rate at which electrolytes decay while moving, in ticks (20 ticks = 1 second).
gatorade.configuration.maxElectrolytes.t: Maximum electrolytes a player can have.
gatorade.configuration.defaultElectrolyt: Default electrolytes level when a player joins.
gatorade.configuration.emptyableSqueezeB: Allow emptying Squeeze Bottles into Gatorade buckets.
gatorade.configuration.gatoradeBathingRe: Enable regeneration of electrolytes while in Gatorade.
Enable electrolyte restoring effects while in Gatorade.
Rate at which players regenerate electrolytes while in Gatorade.
Amount of electrolytes restored per tick while in Gatorade.
gatorade.commands.electrolytes.disabled: Electrolytes system is disabled in the configuration.
